question: Adnyapatra was written by which of the following Peshwa?
explanation: Ramchandra Pant Amatya, the Peshwa of Rajaram wrote the Adnyapatra. In this, he explained different techniques of war, maintenance of forts, and administration. He was sidelined after the arrival of Shahuji in 1707 CE due to his loyalty towards Tarabai.
